description:
The history of Genkai and Toguro is finally revealed! Genkai is at the mercy of her former friend, and as Toguro prepares to deliver the final blow, Yusuke races toward the scene of the battle. What will he find when he arrives?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Genkai moare. Un final după 50 de ani
Maboroshi Umi Chiru! 50 Nen Me no Kecchaku
